name: Premier Manager 10
description:
With improved playability from previous versions, and ease of use, Premier Manager ‘10 is the ideal game for those who love the high-pressure world of topflight football management.


Starting from season 2009/10

Features include:
  • 4 divisions to manage in from England, Germany, Spain, Italy, France & Scotland.
  • All leagues and Cup competitions across Europe’s top footballing nations.
  • Control of every aspect of your favourite club via a friendly, easy to use interface.
  • More in-depth stats and profiles than ever before.
  • Track the improvement and progression of your players and staff over time as they improve and become more effective. These are directly linked to your club’s facilities.
  • Character bar allows easy access to key members of staff and replaces the need for the player to process every news item before moving to the next day.
  • Fully localised into English, French, German and Italian.

WHY OVER COMPLICATE THINGS?
